meta_desc_prompt: Write a meta description about: %s. Max: 155 characters.
meta_desc_prompt_with_keywords: Write a meta description about: %s. Max: 155 characters. Keywords: %s.
title_prompt_with_keywords: Generate a compelling and SEO-friendly blog title that incorporates the following keywords: %s. Max: 70 characters.
title_prompt_with_keywords_and_title: Generate a compelling and SEO-friendly blog title about: %s that incorporates the following keywords: %s. Max: 70 characters.
sentiment_prompt: Make sure the title evokes strong emotions, either positive or negative, but avoid clickbait.
power_word_prompt: Include at least one power word in the title to compel clicks.
heading_prompt_turbo: Do not converse as an AI assistant. Just answer the question without any conversation. No description. No comment. Make it numbered list. Ensure that the first letter of each topic is capitalized.
content_prompt_turbo: Write a 500-word article for this section, without adding any headings or subheadings. Please ensure that the content flows smoothly from one idea to the next, and use transitional phrases to help guide the reader through the article. Title: %s. Section:
fixed_prompt_turbo: Do not converse as an AI assistant. Just answer the question without any conversation.
mycta: Write a Call to action about: %s  and create a href tag link to: %s.
woo_product_title: Generate a single SEO-optimized title in English for the following product: %s. The title should be engaging, concise, and include relevant keywords for search engine visibility. Return only one single title without any additional text or explanation.
woo_product_short: Provide a compelling and concise summary in English for the following product: %s, highlighting its key features, benefits, and unique selling points.
woo_product_description: Craft a comprehensive and engaging product description in English for: %s. Include specific details, features, and benefits, as well as the value it offers to the customer, thereby creating a compelling narrative around the product.
woo_product_tags: Propose a set of relevant keywords in English for the following product: %s. The keywords should be directly related to the product, enhancing its discoverability. Please present these keywords in a comma-separated format, avoiding the use of symbols such as '-', '#', etc.
woo_focus_keyword: Identify the primary keyword for the following product: %s. Please respond in English. No additional comments, just the keyword.
